info.title: Storj Bridge
info.description: Access the Storj network using a simple REST API.

basic.description: Username should equal the registered email address and password must be SHA-256 hash of the cleartext password

get.summary: Lists the contacts according to the supplied query

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Paginagtion indicator, defaults to 1

parameters.name: address
parameters.description: Hostname or IP address

parameters.name: protocol
parameters.description: SemVer protocol tag

parameters.name: userAgent
parameters.description: Storj user agent string for farming client

parameters.name: connected
parameters.description: Filter results by connection status (true/false)

address.description: IP address or hostname of the contact

port.description: Port number the contact is listening on

lastSeen.description: Timestamp when we last encountered this peer

protocol.description: Protocol version this contact is running

get.summary: Performs a lookup for the contact information of a nodeID

parameters.name: nodeID
parameters.description: Node ID of the contact to lookup

address.description: IP address or hostname of the contact

port.description: Port number the contact is listening on

lastSeen.description: Timestamp when we last encountered this peer

protocol.description: Protocol version this contact is running

post.summary: Registers a new user account with Storj Bridge

email.description: Email address for account activation and login

password.description: SHA-256 hash of your plaintext password

201.description: User successfully registered and activation email sent

patch.summary: Requests the reset of the account password

parameters.name: email
parameters.description: The email address of the account for password reset (yours)

password.description: Hex encoded SHA-256 hash of the desired password

redirect.description: Optional redirect URL for successful deletion

delete.summary: Requests the deletion of the account

parameters.name: email
parameters.description: The email address of the account to delete (yours)

redirect.description: Optional redirect URL for successful deletion

get.summary: Confirms the password reset and optionally redirects

parameters.name: token
parameters.description: Confirmation token sent to user's email address

parameters.name: redirect
parameters.description: Optional redirect URL for successful confirmation

post.summary: Sends the user an activation email for reactivating a disabled account

parameters.description: Deactivation token sent to user's email address

email.description: Email address for account activation and login

redirect.description: URL for redirect in email confirmation

get.summary: Activates a registered user and optionally redirects

parameters.name: token
parameters.description: Activation token sent to user's email address

parameters.name: redirect
parameters.description: Optional redirect URL for successful activation

get.summary: Deactivates a registered user and optionally redirects

parameters.name: token
parameters.description: Deactivation token sent to user's email address

parameters.name: redirect
parameters.description: Optional redirect URL for successful deactivation
